title: @RIOT KATEYKHAOS
body: What happened to those Beast Hunter Skins?

replies.body: They're not lost forever - just not ready for their debut yet!
And that's why you don't announce content (e.g. skins) in advance, I still hope people will get this sooner or later xD
It wasn't intentional. D: But yeah, this is why. :P
Of course it wasn't intentional. At least I strongly hope so ^_^

http://youtu.be/HUEhfKe5e08

KHAAAAATEY KHAZIX
Did i did a joke?

I prefer Kittykhaos/Cutiekhaos :3

Or K8y if I'm being trolly
Looks like they were probably stricken from the PBE code as they had a different priority, they'll probably make a return either next cycle, or a little further down the road.
